EmailTemplate.name: HCF - Spelthorne Action Hub Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge - Fantastic Opportunity in Staines
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAINES ACTION HUBS
Have You Got Your Ticket?
YES!! – Brilliant! See you there :)
NO!?! – click this link and book a space.
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/staines-action-hub-tickets-13854219343
Action Hubs are starting in Staines NEXT THURSDAY 6th NOV and will run every fortnight.
@ Brooklands College, Ashford, TW15 2XD
from 17:30 – 19:30.
3 BIG Reasons to be part of The Hubs –
- Be a social action entrepreneur, create a project based on your passion & make a real change!
- Make your UCAS/Job applications STAND OUT. Learn from professionals in marketing, advertising, event management, fundraising, budgeting, branding & design AND MORE
- Have fun!!! Hang out with your friends & make new ones in a fun & informal environment.
Come along to find out more about what we will be doing.
Any questions? Reply to this email or text me on 07587037619
Sammi The Challenge Society
samantha.efford@the-challenge.org 07587037619 Facebook: www.facebook.com/tcs.westlondon Twitter: @challenge_HIHO Blog: http://hcfinspiringyouth-thechallenge.com/
